data_table.description: Ankle Brachial Blood Pressure Index, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANKSBP13
variable.description: Redefined supine ankle systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]

variable.name: ARMSBP13
variable.description: Redefined supine brachial systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]

variable.name: ABI04
variable.description: Ankle brachial index, visit 1 (definition 4) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]

variable.name: ABIV1
variable.description: Abiv1 (ankle brachial index was measured at visit 1) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]
variable.value: Ankle brachial index not measured at visit 1, due to missing one or both blood pressure values
Ankle brachial index measured at visit 1, but one or both blood pressure values out of range, so no valid value
Ankle brachial index measured at visit 1, but value is invalid
Ankle brachial index measured at visit 1 and has a valid value

variable.name: PAD02
variable.description: Pad02 (peripheral artery disease, visit 1, definition 2, Ankle Brachial Index <.9 for both genders) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]

variable.name: PAD01
variable.description: Pad01 (peripheral artery disease, visit 1, definition 1) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]

variable.name: UBMDA01
variable.description: Artery site code: popliteal [1=left, 17=right] [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]

variable.name: LEGANK01
variable.description: Legank01 (leg used for ankle blood pressure at visit 1) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]
variable.value: if UBMDA01 equal to missing, and if the 5th digit in the participant's ID is odd, then code as LID
if UBMDA01 equal to 1 (left leg, based on the popliteal artery scan, noted on the UBMD file)
if UBMDA01 equal missing and if the 5th digit in the participant's ID is even, then code as RID
if UBMDA01 equal 17 (right leg, based on the popliteal artery scan, noted on the UBMD file)

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: De-identified ARIC subject ID [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 1]
